Your Quarterly Notes From Justia Connect 

Welcome to your quarterly updates from Justia Elevate, our customized platform designed to create websites that work for lawyers.

Be sure to check out this email for information on recent updates we’ve made to the Justia Elevate platform, new design and feature options available for your site, and the latest informative guides from the Justia Elevate Help Center and Knowledge Base.

Announcements

Get Justia Connect Pro at No Extra Cost

Because you currently have a Justia Elevate website, you can get Justia Connect Pro at no extra cost! Upgrade to Justia Connect Pro for $199.80/year, and you’ll receive a $200.00 Justia Credit in return that can be applied to your next Justia Elevate renewal.

To take advantage of this opportunity and learn more about additional benefits for Justia Connect Pros, visit connect.justia.com/pro

What's New in Design

New design options are now available for your website's Attorneys stripe. If you'd like to refresh the look and feel of this stripe, it's easy! Just click here to view your options and get started.

You can now include rotating images in the main header banner on your website! View this site for example.

Four new sample websites are available in our design gallery! If you are interested in changing your design theme or adjusting your website elements, check out the newly added designs here.

Justia Elevate Platform Updates

Your WordPress Version Was Updated

We’ve upgraded the WordPress version used on the Justia Elevate Platform to the most recent release. This release features 29 bug fixes in Core and 21 bug fixes for the block editor.

Your Premium Yoast SEO Was Updated

Your Yoast SEO plugin was upgraded to the latest and greatest! This new version includes some general enhancements, bug fixes, and security improvements. To learn more about these upgrades, read this post from Yoast.

Check out the Justia Elevate Help Center to see these new and updated articles, as well as our other resources to help you continuously maximize your Justia Elevate website’s potential!
